channel.title: A bit lag
channel.description: Hey guys I'm testing this new server and there's something in it that's driving me crazy you all are probably familiar with this. When you turn with the left arrow or right arrow after a little while you get this tiny tiny lag and it happens to everything you do like walk after a little while of walking you get it. Think of it as this: Your spinning a piece of paper on a table and its spinning fast now imagine your touching it for less than a second. Well I think it has something to do with the packets I'm not an expert but that's the closest thing I came up with. Source is project insanity based

item.title: A bit lag
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

lol, not sure but its probably unstable as well so you should switch to another source and don’t whatever you do don’t use eudora-world i had it up 2 weeks no lag but it broke literally no one hacked me either i know the difference it literally broke because its not a stable source… now it disconnects people and i have to restart server…

Read full topic
